metadata.title: CVE-2012-3514 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
OCaml Xml-Light Library before r234 computes hash values withoutrestricting the ability to trigger hash collisions predictably, whichallows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (CPUconsumption) via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-3514` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml-light-ocaml - 2.2-17
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xml-light package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2-17').
